```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

We will replicate the results of a study from the resulting dataset after the protocol.

# Clean data

```{r data load}
# Initial data load and mutation of chr type to factor
res <- read.delim("Results.txt", header = TRUE, sep=" ") |> 
  mutate(GROUP = as.factor(GROUP)) |> 
  mutate(SUBJ = as.factor(SUBJ)) |> 
  mutate(TRIAL = as.factor(TRIAL)) |> 
  mutate(ORI = as.factor(ORI)) |> 
  mutate(DIR = as.factor(DIR)) |> 
  mutate(ID = as.factor(ID)) |> 
  mutate(REP = as.factor(REP))
summary(res)

# Arrange data so as to remove the ID3 group that lacks observations
res_filt <- res |> 
  filter(ID!="ID3")

summary(res_filt)

# Arrange data so as to remove R3 observations, because not complete
res_filt <- res |> 
  filter(ID!="ID3") |> 
  filter(REP!="R3")

summary(res_filt)

```


# ANOVA to scout the interaction effect of group and difficulty index on movement time.

```{r ANOVA}

anova_res <- aov(MovementTime ~ GROUP * ID, data = res_filt)
summary(anova_res)

```
